ow.id
クラス ID

java.lang.Object
  ow.id.ID
すべての実装されたインタフェース:
java.io.Externalizable, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<ID>
public final class ID
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Externalizable, java.lang.Comparable<ID>

An ID with arbitrary length. Note that internal representation is big endian.

関連項目:
直列化された形式

メソッドの詳細

copy

public ID copy(int newSize)

getID

public static ID getID(byte[] id,
                       int size)
Returns a new ID instance with the value specified by the given byte array.

パラメータ:
id - value in big endian.
size - ID size in byte.

getID

public static ID getID(java.math.BigInteger id,
                       int size)
Returns a new ID instance with the value specified by the given BigInteger.

getID

public static ID getID(java.lang.String hexString,
                       int size)
Returns a new ID instance with the value given as a String.

パラメータ:
hexString - ID string.
size - size of the ID in byte.
戻り値:
generated ID.

getRandomID

public static ID getRandomID(int size)
Returns a new ID having random value.

getSHA1BasedID

public static ID getSHA1BasedID(byte[] bytes)
Returns a newly generated ID with a hashed value of the specified byte array. The size of ID is 20.

getSHA1BasedID

public static ID getSHA1BasedID(byte[] bytes,
                                int sizeInByte)
Returns a newly generated ID with a hashed value of the specified byte array. Maximum size of ID is 160 bit (20 byte) because the hashing algorithm is SHA1.

パラメータ:
sizeInByte - the size of generated ID in byte (<= 20).

getHashcodeBasedID

public static ID getHashcodeBasedID(java.lang.Object obj,
                                    int sizeInByte)
Returns a newly generated ID based on the hashcode of the specified object. Maximum size of ID is 160 bit (20 byte) because the hashing algorithm is SHA1.

パラメータ:
sizeInByte - the size of generated ID in byte (<= 20).

getSize

public int getSize()
Length of this ID in byte.

getValue

public byte[] getValue()

getBits

public int getBits(int from,
                   int len)
Returns bits.

パラメータ:
from - starting index from LSB.
len - number of bits.

shiftLeft

public ID shiftLeft(int n)
Returns an ID whose value is (this << n).

shiftRight

public ID shiftRight(int n)
Returns an ID whose value is (this >> n).

setBit

public ID setBit(int n)
Returns an ID whose value is equivalent to this ID with the designated bit set.

clearBit

public ID clearBit(int n)
Returns an ID whose value is equivalent to this ID with the designated bit cleared.

public static int matchLengthFromMSB(ID a,
                                     ID b)
